description:
This course is designed to help you define, identify, and develop a cross organizational - high performance digital business strategy and transformation team. It provides a powerful framework and tools that help you focus your company on the right team development issues, organize your efforts, define and develop your team, and hold your first planning meeting.

Build a High Performance Team That Can Transform Your Company Into a Digital Leader.

  • Define team roles and responsibilities
  • Identify and qualify the best possible candidates
  • Assess and develop team skills
  • Define and lead a powerful initial planning meeting

Gain the insight and tools you need to quickly define, organize, launch, and manage a digital team that can successfully establish your company as a digital leader.

This course takes you step by step through creating a digital strategy and transformation team. It guides you in selecting, managing, developing and supporting that team. And provides detailed guidance on how to define and manage your initial planning meeting.

It includes 9 lessons, a 90 page interactive workbook and a 390 slide presentation deck to facilitate stakeholder and team definition and planning meetings.

Course lessons include:

  • Introduction to Building a Digital Dream Team
  • Defining Team Roles and Responsibilities
  • Assigning Team Leader Specific Responsibilities
  • Establishing a Successful Team Management Methodology
  • Assess, Training and Developing Team Skills
  • Preparing for Your Initial Planning Meeting
  • Facilitating Your Team Planning Meeting
  • Establishing Strategic, Transformation, and Discovery Priorities

This course is part of the â€œCompeting for the Digital Future" a comprehensive 8 part, executive level program on digital leadership. The program is based on years of helping build successful high tech teams that can translate emerging technology into business momentum. I look forward to helping you build an amazing team and successful digital future for your company.
title: Build a Digital Transformation Dream Team
